content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #3199:

It's worth pointing out that review-wise I've tried to keep each commit here separate and ideally actually passing all the tests. If the whole PR is a bit much to review I'm hoping that individual commit-by-commit is easier to see what's going on.

This also includes https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3196 as one commit as well, which can be skipped over in favor of that PR.
